meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by red, raised, itchy welts
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her with urticarias after examining the red, itchy welts on her skin.
meanings.sent2: Many people suffer from urticarias during allergy season due to the raised welts on their skin.
meanings.sent3: The urticarias on his skin made him look like a human connect-the-dots puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her urticarias were like angry red mountains erupting on her skin.
meanings.sent5: The itching and burning sensation from the urticarias was unbearable.

meanings.definition: The plural form of urticaria, referring to multiple instances of the skin condition
meanings.sent1: In the waiting room, there were several patients discussing their urticarias and sharing experiences.
meanings.sent2: The dermatologist specializes in treating various urticarias that patients present with.
meanings.sent3: The family reunion turned into a urticarias support group meeting.
meanings.sent4: The garden was blooming with different types of flowers, just like the various urticarias cases the doctor had seen.
meanings.sent5: The nurse kept a detailed record of all the different urticarias cases in the clinic.
